FuncDef: The reset application command restarts an application in the open application system. The reset application command restarts an application in the open application system.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an application.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Examples: Warning: The application app1 will be reset. Continue? [Y/N]:y
